Room.Name: Brownhaven Way/Plasnelt Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Brownhaven Way and Plasnelt Road.
Room.LongDescription: You are in the nicer part of the village and see many fine homes along the roads. You can go along Plasnelt Road to the east toward the center of the village, or west toward the village gate. There are a lot of nice shops and stores going north and south.
